snippet: The family of the former Formula One champion said his recovery from a skiing accident would continue at his estate on the shore of Lake Geneva.
abstract: Family of Formula One champion Michael Schumacher announces that he has been moved from hospital in Lausanne, Switzerland to family home in Lake Geneva, where he will continue recovery from severe brain injuries suffered in December 2013 skiing accident.
lead_paragraph: The family of the former Formula One champion said his recovery from a skiing accident would continue at his estate on the shore of Lake Geneva.

headline.main: Michael Schumacher Moved Home to Continue Rehabilitation
